content: Hi! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. Can I get your name to get started with booking your appointment?

Great, thanks! Let me confirm that your address is within our service area.
I'm sorry, I'm having trouble verifying your address in our service area. I'm going to connect you with a member of our team to assist further. Please hold on just a moment.
reason: Service area lookup failure - needs human help
